page.title: 11Patchway Community Centre
page.content: This centre in Rodway Road cares for all ages from toddlers to old people. The warden a secretary and a committee organise activities for the people of the community. Here is a list of the present activities:{MONDAY Aerobics 2-3pm Ballet 4.30pm Drama 7.30-10pm Computer Club 7.0pm{TUESDAY Coffee morning 10.am Aerobics 7.0pm Fitness world 8.15pm Art club 7.30pm {WEDNESDAY}Mothers and toddlers 10.00am Physically handicapped 3.30pm Writers workshop 2.30-3.30pm Korean Karate 6.30pm Ladies keep fit 8-10pm{THURSDAY O.A.P. club 2-3.30pm Writers workshop 2-3.30pm Weight watchers 2-3.30pm Badminton 7-10pm{FRIDAY}Dancing 7.30- 10pm Art club{SATURDAY}Ballroom Dance {SUNDAY}Junior Theatre Workshop 2.30pm. The centre has a hall with a stage, a lounge, a kitchen, a council room and notices, tables and chairs.
